Journal.Title: Physical medicine and rehabilitation clinics of North America
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Phys Med Rehabil Clin N Am

Article.ArticleTitle: Postacute Sequelae of SARS-CoV-2: Musculoskeletal Conditions and Pain.

Abstract.AbstractText: Musculoskeletal and pain sequelae of COVID-19 are common in both the acute infection and patients experiencing longer term symptoms associated with recovery, known as postacute sequelae of COVID-19 (PASC). Patients with PASC may experience multiple manifestations of pain and other concurrent symptoms that complicate their experience of pain. In this review, the authors explore what is currently known about PASC-related pain and its pathophysiology as well as strategies for diagnosis and management.
